Couldn't get the hash in the right format for *john* `(unsupported database file version [4])`, so had to create this lil' helper to crack keepass database files easily. Implemented in go.

**‚ö†Ô∏è For educational purposes only!**

## Getting started

Clone this reporitory:

```
git clone https://github.com/original-flipser69/keepass-rush.git
```

Usage:

```
keepass-rush -path /path/to/database.kdbx -wordlist /path/to/wordlist.txt
```

## Documentation

Still questions left? Check the docs in my [crib](https://originalflipster.com/docs/keepass-rush)
